document_data.name: Sylbert
document_data.mainbody:
'''Sylbert''' was a [[healer]] from the [[Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''I'm sure you're lovely, but you see - strangers - it's difficult. You understand.''|Healer Sylbert}}
document_data.Description: Sylbert was a middle-aged [[hin]] man with a light skin tone and chestnut eye color. He had light brown facial hair.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Sylbert spent his days at the [[Harbourview Park]] in the Lower City, helping recovery of [[Twitch Broven]], a former [[Flaming Fist]] who had still long road to recovery ahead.
